reviews.text:
Wasn’t our favorite hotel but sufficient if you understand what you are getting into. The location is really good being only a few minute walk from a large train station.

The service was fine, nothing spectacular but they held our bags for us and weren’t rude or unfriendly.

The room was not good. Very small with no air conditioning and very poor circulation. It was cool outside (~18° C/65° F) and the room was probably ~27° C/80° F which was very uncomfortable. No fan in the room or bathroom. We got a small fan from the front desk but that barely helped. We had to have the windows wide open all night and there is a lot of loud car and bus traffic outside.

To make matters worse we tried to do laundry (which cost 8 CHF!) and the machines were extremely difficult to get working then the washer left our clothes soaking wet which required us to dry multiple times and was still damp. After staying up an hour or two later than we wanted to get our clothes dry we gave up and had to hang them which were still barely dry in the morning.

2 years since the last visit to the same hotel

They renew all rooms with modern and new furniture and be more comfortable.

The place have a great positive vibes so when you reach the hotel you will feel it.

The breakfast is perfect.

The employees are helpful and kind.

The location of the hotel is good
Bit expensive for what you get
Don't expect much, the furniture feels old and not maintained and the rooms ( single rooms) are not that good regarding the space and not being occupied with fridges
The breakfast is very limited and poor variety.
The staff are helpful and friendly specially the room service.

generally it's okay experience

Nice, modern hotel located at the end of the main strip in Buchs. Everything was comfortable with the room except there is no AC and it was a bit warm when we were there, but don't think that's too abnormal. Service was friendly and helpful. Short walking distance to many restaurants and bars. Breakfast is OK, nothing special. Would stay here again.

I will not stay here again.
- The restaurant is expensive (you can have dinner outside with two large beers for the price of one dish here)
- My shower was leaking
- I asked for a tooth paste kit - they charged it to the room
- You can't hang a towel in the bathroom
- You can't regulate temperature in you room except by opening a window
- Poor breakfast
Advantages:
- The Internet was fast (240Mb/s)
- The restaurant is pretty
- The restaurant staff are very nice
